comment.author: 7279101@N06
comment._content: Typo in the title, you have "Borgium" correct name is "Borglum". Solon Borglum, American sculptor. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solon_Borglum

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Brother of Gutzon Borglum, who carved the faces on Mount Rushmore.

comment.author: 34985608@N03
comment._content: Thanks for catching the typo and supplying more information. We'll fix the catalog record when we update.
